entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 27 March 2023
